ja508:6.1: pituhadayassa → hadayassa (bj) | paddhagū → patthagū (sya1ed, sya2ed); pattagū (mr)
ja508:8.3: Anipphannatā → anipphādāya (bj, pts-vp-pli1); anipphannatāya (sya1ed, sya2ed); ānipphādā (?)
ja508:9.2: Dvipadajaninda → dipadinda (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | metaṁ → netaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); te taṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja508:10.1: Paṇhe → pañño (bj, pts-vp-pli1); pañhe (sya1ed, sya2ed); panhe (mr)
ja508:16.3: Devindassa gataṁ tadajja hatthaṁ → devindassa tadajja hatthagataṁ (mr)
